title: About the Neo PAX sivir skin

embed.description: The ultra-rare PAX Sivir will return to the grid with new colors as Neo PAX Sivir, craftable with 10 gemstones from 31/8/17 at 19:00 BST until 8/1/18 at 07:59 GMT, when it will return to the Legacy vault. Neo PAX Sivir will also drop as a skin shard, which has an increased chance to appear in the new Epic Capsules.

body:
Imagine that today i already have the 10 gemstones, i can keep them until that event starts and i can use all that 10 gemstones to get the Neo Pax sivir? or do i need to get the gemstones after the event startes?
Can i buy some loot today and if i get all the gemstones i need i can later use them to craft the PAX sivir skin?

replies.body:
LastShadow with the assist!

You don't need to get 10 new gemstones once she comes out, you can use the ones you currently have to buy her when she's released!
As long as you have 10 gemstones to can unlock it, it doesn't matter when you got them(it never has for any of these skins loot exclusive skins).
Thanks dude! Have a nice day!
